name: MONDO LABS
description:
WELCOME TO THE MONDO LABS. post-release notes:

you need to remove poop from the processing organs, otherwise they will get clogged and stop working!

HTML5 version recommended unless it runs like a potato. PC version has a bug and it doesn’t display GREEN and RED boxes to show if a structure is buildable and laser effects are missing. HTML5 version is OK.

HELLO YOUNG BRAIN. TODAY WE WILL LEARN HOW TO HARVEST CANCER.

MONDO LABS is a game about creating and managing a cancer-harvesting factory inside a synthetic body.

  • BUILD your way around in order to satisfy the mad scientist that brought you to life.
  • MANAGE a network of transport belts, resource processing organs and cancer harvesting towers.
  • GROW in the avaliable body area to the fullest potential, including building on the vertical walls.
  • SATISFY the doctor and help him finalize his greatest creation.
  • SOLVE 5 short scenarios with a grand finale.

CONTROLS:

All controls and systems will be introduced in-game so you can jump in without reading the instructions.

  • MOUSE for interactions
  • LMB to confirm
  • R to rotate the current building
  • RMB to clear the cursor
  • WASD to move the camera
  • Q/E to rotate the camera
  • SCROLL to zoom
  • DEL to enter delete mode
  • 1/2/3/4/5/6 keyboard shortucts for buildings

made in 72h for LUDUM DARE 52 / theme: HARVEST

by CANNIBAL GIRL / cannibalgirl.fun

tools used: Unreal Engine 4.23, 3dsmax, photoshop, adobe audition, ableton live, native instruments, freesound.org, private sample library
